name: identifi-lib
description: Basic tools for reading and writing Identifi messages and identities.

scripts.lint: npm run lint:eslint && npm run lint:flow
scripts.lint:test: npm run lint && npm run test:coverage
scripts.build: clear && npm run lint:test && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:es && npm run build:umd
scripts.build:watch: clear && rimraf cjs && cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs babel -w src --out-dir cjs
scripts.build:es: rimraf es && cross-env BABEL_ENV=es babel src --out-dir es
scripts.build:cjs: rimraf cjs && cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src --out-dir cjs
scripts.build:umd: rimraf dist && cross-env BABEL_ENV=es rollup -c & cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=production rollup -c

author: Martti Malmi (martti.malmi@iki.fi)
